definition: Nankai district of Tianjin municipality 天津市[Tian1 jin1 shi4]
south
surname Nan

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
Nankai University (Tianjin)
Hebei district of Tianjin municipality 天津市[Tian1 jin1 shi4]

sentences.english: Gong Tian is located at No. 41 Shanggu Business Center on Tianta Road in Nankai District.
sentences.chinese: 宫田，位于南开区天塔路41号上谷商业区。

sentences.english: The Philosophy Department of Nankai University is one of the important bases for fostering philosophical talents.
sentences.chinese: 南开大学哲学系是全国哲学人才培养基地之一。

sentences.english: Take the A train south to the Liberty Ave. stop.
sentences.chinese: 坐往南开的A列车到自由大街站。

sentences.english: The southbound A trains say Brooklyn.
sentences.chinese: 往南开的A列地铁上写着“布鲁克林”。

sentences.english: Tianjin Nankai School in 1917 after graduation, studied in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 1917年天津南开学校结业后，留学日本。

sentences.english: An examination given at the middle of a school or college term.
sentences.chinese: 我现在南开中学初中三上级就学。

sentences.english: From Simao we drove southward through the mountains towards Jinghong.
sentences.chinese: 我们的车了从思茅往南开，通过丛山，开往景洪。

sentences.english: The century-old famous Nankai Middle School of Tianjin is only one hundred steps from the Clothing Street.
sentences.chinese: 百年名校天津南开中学距服装街仅百步之遥。

sentences.english: Editing Group for Experimental Animal Anatomy of Nankai University.
sentences.chinese: 南开大学实验动物解剖学编写组。

sentences.english: The process of the development of Nankai university virtual digital campus system was given in detail in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 详细介绍了南开大学虚拟数字校园系统的开发过程。

sentences.english: Zhang Boling was the creator of Nankai University.
sentences.chinese: 张伯苓是南开大学的创建者。

sentences.english: So far, it is the model school with the least area in Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 天津市第二南开中学是天津市用地最小的示范高中。

sentences.english: The disease situations have influenced Chirs's teaching work in Nankai University in Tianjin of China.
sentences.chinese: 病情影响到克里斯应聘在中国天津南开大学的教学。
